name: Skills Balance
author: Marc
description: Eagle Eye: Chances to learn a spell increased from 40/50/60% to 50/65/80%, and spell level that can be learned increased from 2/3/4 to 3/4/5  First Aid: Extra Healing increased from 50/75/100   to 75/150/250  Artillery: All levels of this skill now have 100% chance to do x2 damage. Balista will shoot 1/2/3 arrow based on skill level.  Learning: Experienced gained increased from 5/10/15% to 10/20/30%  Sorcery: Spell damage increased from 5/10/15% to 10/20/30%
